SELECT COUNT(*) AS totcnt FROM COMVN_USER_MASTER A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_LOGIN_POLICY B ON A.USER_ID = B.EMPLYR_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.USER_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchVO.searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT A.USER_ID AS "emplyrId" , A.USER_NM AS "emplyrNm" , A.USER_SE AS "emplyrSe" , B.IP_INFO AS "ipInfo" , B.DPLCT_PERM_AT AS "dplctPermAt" , NVL(B.LMTT_AT,'N') AS "lmttAt" , B.LAST_UPDUSR_ID AS "userId" , B.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS "regDate" , (CASE B.EMPLYR_ID WHEN NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS "regYn" FROM COMVN_USER_MASTER A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_LOGIN_POLICY B ON A.USER_ID = B.EMPLYR_ID WHERE A.USER_ID = #{emplyrId}
